CustomField.description: Numeric value of System When. Used to compare against Nurse Recommendation When.
CustomField.formula: CASE( VCC_System_RFL__c , 'Emergency department',7, 'Urgent care center',6, 'Clinic',5, 'Dentist office',4, 'Virtual care',3, 'Home',2, 1)
CustomField.label: System Where Value
